title: Rock n' Roll

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Play a sick guitar riff at night, attracting all visitors from a player of your choice. You will learn the names and roles of all your visitors, though you will not know who is who.
- Amplify a player. They will perform their ability a second time on a player of your choice, ignoring limited uses or limits of an ability. They will informed that they were amplified.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Amplification essentially works as a control, just that it doesn't replace the target's original action.
- Control/redirection immune.

desc:
Post 225
*Strummin' that guitar to the rhythm that just won't stopâ€”don't stop!*
